name: echarts-tabulator-api-server
description: Comprehensive API server for ECharts charts (Line, Bar, Combined, Pie, Donut) and Tabulator tables with real-time data support

scripts.check-node: node -v && npm -v && echo "âœ… Node.js version check passed"
scripts.check-engines: npm run check-node && echo "ðŸ“¦ Checking package.json engines..." && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const engines=pkg.engines; console.log('Required Node.js:', engines.node); console.log('Required npm:', engines.npm);"
scripts.clean: npm run kill-port && echo "ðŸ§¹ Port 3000 cleaned"
scripts.dev-restart: npm run clean && npm run dev

author: API Developer <developer@example.com>
